short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save up on time while filling out long and repetitive CFP forms.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you a regular at conferences, weary of the endless cycle of filling out Call For Papers (CFP) forms? You deserve better. Scream For Papers is revolutionizing the way speakers engage with conference applications.

Fill forms in a couple of clicks. No more copy-pasting between multiple forms for each event. 

Store your data directly in your browser, backed up by a good ol' Github account.

Keep track of your preferred conferences. Add events to your wishlist and plan your applications.

Keep track of your submissions. Each and every one is recorded in your dashboard.

Own your data. Unlike centralized platforms that require conference organizers to pay for shared services, we ensure that your data remains yours. No reliance on third-party submission platforms, you have complete control and privacy.
